name: TWLOHA
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: write love
des: We believe hope and help are real. You are not alone in your struggles. This is not the end of your story. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
